title: Jarchi Mosque
text: The Jarchi mosque () was built according to a <a href="Thuluth">Thuluth</a> <a href="inscription">inscription</a> above its <a href="spandrel">spandrel</a> in 1610 under the supervision of <a href="Abbas%20I%20of%20Persia">Shah Abbas</a>' herald. The word "Jarchi" means <a href="herald">herald</a> in <a href="Azerbaijani%20language">Azeri</a> and <a href="Persian%20language">Persian</a>. The <a href="mosque">mosque</a> has a <a href="shabestan">shabestan</a> and is located in the <a href="Bazaar%20of%20Isfahan">Great Bazaar</a> (Bazaar-e-Bozorg) of <a href="Isfahan">Isfahan</a>. Decorations of this mosque are mainly destroyed.
